typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (movieid as string, year as integer, rating as integer, genres as string[], title as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
source1 derive(movies = @(movieis=movies.movieid,
		year=movies.year,
		rating=movies.rating * 10,
		genres=movies.genres,
		title=movies.title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/titles'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		movies,
		id
	)) ~> sink1
